title: Roasted potato salad with cumin and yoghurt dressing
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', 'Salt and black pepper', '5 small baking potatoes, scrubbed', '125g (4½ oz) mixed salad leaves', 'For the dressing', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', 'Juice of ½ lemon', '100g (3½ oz) half-fat Greek yoghurt']
